title: Questions Remain About Airbag Recall After Takata Testifies Before House
teaser: Auto parts supplier Takata has agreed to modify the way it makes airbags. Takata and government safety officials were on Capitol Hill Tuesday to answer questions about the massive recall effort. Some 34 million vehicles need to have new airbags installed.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
